text: Potassium arsenite is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is KAsO2. It has potassium and arsenite ions in it. ==Properties== It is a solid. It is highly toxic. ==Preparation== It is made by reacting arsenic trioxide with potassium hydroxide. ==Uses== It was used as a "medicine", but it is carcinogenic and toxic so it is not used anymore. It is banned for use as a pesticide in the United Kingdom. ==Related pages== *Sodium arsenite *Lead arsenate *Zinc arsenide Category:Potassium compounds Category:Arsenic compounds
title: Potassium arsenite
